Discourse Structure prediction.from sentence: From the results , we see some improvement on Discourse Structure prediction when we are using a joint model but the improvement is statistically significant only for the Nuclearity and Relation predictions .

Relation predictions.from sentence: The improvements on the Relation predictions were mainly on the Contrastive set , specifically the class of Contrast , Comparison and Cause relations as .

fine grained setting.from sentence: In the fine grained setting we compute the accuracy of exact match across five classes .
